t: What is Amazon Brand Analytics? — Reason Automation
s: May 28, 2024 - Amazon Brand Analytics offers insights into customer behavior, keyword performance, sales trends, and more. With this data, Vendors and Sellers can optimize their listings, improve their marketing strategies, and ultimately increase their sales on Amazon.

t: How to Use Amazon Brand Analytics for Your Sales Strategy
s: Amazon Brand Analytics is an add-on feature for sellers registered to Amazon Seller Central. The dashboard offers customer data on search terms, customer information, competitor performance, and buyer behavioral trends.
